effect.name: Film Grain
effect.description: Adds film-like grain and softens the picture
effect.author: esmane

parameter.name: grain_r
Red Grain
parameter.comment: The percentage of grain applied to the red channel

parameter.name: grain_g
Green Grain
parameter.comment: The percentage of grain applied to the green channel

parameter.name: grain_b
Blue Grain
parameter.comment: The percentage of grain applied to the blue channel

parameter.name: dust_amt
Dust Amount
parameter.comment: The amount of dust particles on the image

parameter.name: flicker_amt
Flicker Amount
parameter.comment: The amount of variation in brightness between frames
